DOC.brief_summary: National multicenter, prospective, observational study in cancer patients with chronic background pain and breakthrough pain to whom PecFent® has been prescribed under pragmatic condition by a specialist in the treatment of cancer pain conditions. • Study objectives include assessment of early treatment satisfaction.
DOC.brief_title: Patient Satisfaction and Quality of Life Impact - PecFent®
DOC.criteria: Adult (aged ≥18 years) with cancer Taking at least 60 mg of oral morphine sulfate or equivalent per day for chronic background pain
